name: Star-wars-the-force-falcons
tagline: Star Wars game where all the ships of the Dark Side be destroyed must
body:
### Welcome to Star Wars: The Force Falcons
After Breaking the Great Wall of the Dark Side, our star fighters are engaged to destroy all enemy ships.

### Unity 3D Game Engine 
The Game is developed with Unity and MonoDevelop with C# as scripting Language. Unity 5.4 now features exporting to ALL platforms.

### Game Sprites
* http://weaponix.deviantart.com/gallery/49221345/STAR-WARS

### Game Sounds
Sounds Credits to:
* http://www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com/
* http://www.bfxr.net/
* https://soundcloud.com/paulo-bohrer-ii/star-wars-chiptune-medley
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
